<<<<<<< HEAD
A new ballad of King John and the abbot of Canterbury. To the tune of, The King and the Lord Abbot.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill. (woodcuts)
Printed for P. Brooksby ..., [London] : [between 1670 and 1696]
"With allowance. Ro. L'Estrange." Date of publication from Wing CD-Rom, 1996. Verse: "I'll tell you a story, a story anon,". Imperfect: copy dark and mutilated, affecting text. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
